# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper mining drill at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)

Consists of a transport-belt at position (x=64.5, y=-53.5) with status EntityStatus.WORKING.

# ERROR TIPS
* The burner-mining-drill at position (x=41.0, y=-82.0) has status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL, indicating that it needs fuel to operate. Ensure that fuel is provided to the drill.
* The stone-furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-80.0) has status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL, indicating that it needs fuel to operate. Ensure that fuel is provided to the furnace.
* The burner-inserter at position (x=39.5, y=-79.5) has status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS, indicating that it is waiting for items to insert. Ensure that items are provided to the inserter.
* The burner-inserter at position (x=41.5, y=-78.5) has status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL, indicating that it needs fuel to operate. Ensure that fuel is provided to the inserter.
* The stone-furnace at position (x=60.0, y=-60.0) has status EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS, indicating that it needs ingredients to operate. Ensure that ingredients are provided to the furnace.
* The boiler at position (x=111.5, y=-32.0) has status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL, indicating that it needs fuel to operate. Ensure that fuel is provided to the boiler.
* The steam-engine at position (x=117.5, y=-30.5) has status EntityStatus.NOT_CONNECTED, indicating that it is not connected to a power source. Ensure that the steam-engine is connected to a power source.
